objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1E1E2F'/><defs><radialGradient id='techGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#3D4466'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#131327'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#8A9AD1' stop-opacity='0.2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#3D4466' stop-opacity='0.2'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#techGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#8A9AD1' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='10,5'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='310' fill='none' stroke='#8A9AD1' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='850' cy='420' r='120' fill='url(#accentGradient)' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='2'/><g opacity='0.5'><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='5' fill='#A6B3E2'/><circle cx='930' cy='150' r='5' fill='#A6B3E2'/><circle cx='150' cy='930' r='5' fill='#A6B3E2'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='5' fill='#A6B3E2'/></g><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M200 300 L270 230' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M880 300 L810 230' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M200 780 L270 850' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M880 780 L810 850' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='2'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='300' cy='200' r='80' fill='none' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='780' cy='200' r='60' fill='none' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='300' cy='880' r='60' fill='none' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='780' cy='880' r='80' fill='none' stroke='#A6B3E2' stroke-width='1'/></g><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='280' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text: • TRANSPARENT DESIGN • WIRELESS CONNECTIVITY • CUSTOM CONTROLS

product_details.description: Reveal the mysteries within the Xbox Wireless Controller – Ghost Cipher Special Edition featuring a transparent clear design, silver interior, metallic features, and more. Look through the clear, transparent top case and side caps to see metallic, silver interior parts shine through from inside. Hold on to the action with rubberized, Ash Gray grips on the back-case. Stay elegantly on target with bronze metallic triggers and a matching bronze metallic D-pad. Seamlessly capture and share content such as screenshots, recordings, and more with the dedicated Share button. Connect using the USB-C port for direct plug and play to console and PC. Support for AA batteries is included on the rear. Get up to 40 hours of battery life. Plug in any compatible headset with the 3.5mm audio jack. Use the Xbox Accessories app to remap buttons and create custom controller profiles for your favorite games. Quickly pair with, play on, and switch between devices including console, PC, and mobile.* XBOX GHOST CIPHER WIRELESS CONTROLLER: F Featuring a transparent clear design, silver interior, metallic features, and more. Look through the clear transparent top case and side caps to see metallic, silver interior parts shine through from inside. STAY ON TARGET: Hold on to the action with rubberized, Ash Gray grips on the back-case. Bronze metallic triggers and a matching D-pad help you stay on target. SHARE BUTTON: Seamlessly capture and share content such as screenshots, recordings, and more with the new Share button. PLAY ACROSS DEVICES: Includes Xbox Wireless and Bluetooth technology so you can easily pair and switch between devices including Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Windows PC, Android, and iOS.* COMPATIBILITY: Plug in any compatible headset with the 3.5mm audio headset jack. Connect using the USB-C port for direct plug and play to console or PC.* CUSTOM BUTTON MAPPING: Make the controller your own by customizing button mappings with the Xbox Accessories app.*

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek, modern product advertisement centered on a tech-themed aesthetic. At the top, bold and futuristic typography in the `heading` layer emphasizes the product category, followed by the `subheading` layer which hints at the edition name in a soft purple tone. The centerpiece is a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) of a transparent game controller, surrounded by concentric circular accents in dotted and solid outlines that suggest advanced technology. The `price` layer is placed prominently over a highlighted circular background to capture attention. Supporting information in the `description` layer outlines major features. A call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with clearly legible, contrasting text (`cta`) encourages interaction. 

**Color Palette**:
- Midnight Blue: `#1E1E2F` (Background)
- Lavender Blue: `#A6B3E2` (Accent Lines and Button)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (Text and Highlights)
- Slate Blue: `#3D4466` (Gradient Element)
- Very Light Blue: `#8A9AD1` (Gradient and Details)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern Xbox controller with a translucent casing that highlights its internal design. The color palette primarily features cool metallic tones that blend sophistication with futuristic appeal. Key colors include metallic silver (#C0C0C0), translucent white (#F2F2F2), soft gray (#A9A9A9), and a standout metallic gold on the D-pad (#D4AF37). The translucent casing creates a layered, shadowed effect that subtly highlights internal components, creating a harmonious blend of depth and detail. The gold accent contrasts sharply against the cool tones, drawing user attention effectively. This palette is ideal for creating high-tech, premium marketing banners.
